description: This interface is inherited from 0:BaseInterfaceType to add additional parameters of a tool in a tightening system. It shall be added to 2:Parameters object of the tool instance.

contents.name: DesignType
contents.description: DesignType provides information on the design of the Tool.

contents.name: DriveMethod
contents.description: DriveMethod provides information on the drive method of the motor of the Tool.

contents.name: DriveType
contents.description: DriveType provides information on the drive type of the Tool.

contents.name: MaxSpeed
contents.description: MaxSpeed is the maximum rotation speed of the driving shaft.

fields.name: MaxSpeed
fields.description: MaxSpeed is the maximum rotation speed of the driving shaft.

fields.name: PhysicalQuantity
fields.description: PhysicalQuantity is to determine the type of the physical quantity associated to a given value(s).

contents.name: MaxTorque
contents.description: MaxTorque is the maximum allowed torque for which the tool may be used for tightening processes. For Click Wrenches, it may not be available.

fields.name: MaxTorque
fields.description: MaxTorque is the maximum allowed torque for which the tool may be used for tightening processes. For Click Wrenches, it may not be available.

fields.name: PhysicalQuantity
fields.description: PhysicalQuantity is to determine the type of the physical quantity associated to a given value(s).

contents.name: MinTorque
contents.description: MinTorque is the minimum allowed torque for which the tool may be used for tightening processes.

fields.name: MinTorque
fields.description: MinTorque is the minimum allowed torque for which the tool may be used for tightening processes.

fields.name: PhysicalQuantity
fields.description: PhysicalQuantity is to determine the type of the physical quantity associated to a given value(s).

contents.name: MotorType
contents.description: MotorType is the type of motor in the tool.

contents.name: ShutOffMethod
contents.description: ShutOffMethod provides information on the shutoff method of the tool.
